item.title: 独家：TikTok、YouTube、Meta eye 印度尼西亚电子商务许可证 - 消息来源
item.description:
TikTok and YouTube are considering joining Meta in applying for e-commerce licenses in Indonesia after Southeast Asia's largest economy banned online shopping on social media platforms, people familiar with the discussions said.翻译:知情人士称，在东南亚最大经济体禁止在社交媒体平台上进行网上购物后，TikTok 和 YouTube 正在考虑与 Meta 一起在印度尼西亚申请电子商务牌照。

Indonesia's trade ministry banned e-commerce transactions on social media a month ago, saying it sought to protect small and midsize offline merchants and marketplaces, and to ensure users' data was protected.翻译:印度尼西亚贸易部一个月前禁止社交媒体上的电子商务交易，称其旨在保护中小型线下商家和市场，并确保用户数据受到保护。

With a population of more than 270 million, Indonesia generated nearly $52 billion in e-commerce transactions last year, according to data from consultancy Momentum Works.翻译:根据咨询公司 Momentum Works 的数据，印度尼西亚人口超过 2.7 亿，去年电子商务交易额接近 520 亿美元。

The law was a particular blow to TikTok, which had pledged in June to invest billions of dollars in Southeast Asia, mainly in Indonesia where it has a base of 125 million users, in a major push to build its e-commerce service TikTok Shop.翻译:这项法律对 TikTok 来说是一个特别的打击，该公司 6 月份曾承诺在东南亚（主要是拥有 1.25 亿用户的印度尼西亚） 投资数十亿美元，大力推动建立其电子商务服务 TikTok Shop。

The app, owned by Chinese technology giant Bytedance, plans to apply for an e-commerce license and is exploring the best path to do so, three people familiar with the matter told Reuters.翻译:三名知情人士告诉路透社，该应用程序由中国科技巨头字节跳动拥有，计划申请电子商务许可证，并正在探索最佳途径。

TikTok is holding talks for potential partnerships with local e-commerce players, including GoTo's Tokopedia, while building a standalone TikTok Shop app for Indonesia, the people said.翻译:知情人士称，TikTok 正在与当地电子商务公司（包括 GoTo 旗下的 Tokopedia）就潜在合作伙伴关系进行谈判，同时为印度尼西亚开发独立的 TikTok Shop 应用程序。

Until TikTok Shop stopped operations in Indonesia this month, it was delivering about 3 million parcels a day in Indonesia, two sources said.翻译:两位消息人士称，直到本月 TikTok Shop 在印度尼西亚停止运营之前，该公司每天在印度尼西亚运送约 300 万个包裹。

TikTok said it could neither confirm nor deny it was considering seeking a license. Tokopedia did not immediately respond to requests for comment.翻译:TikTok 表示，它既不能证实也不能否认正在考虑寻求许可。 Tokopedia 没有立即回应置评请求。

Alphabet's (GOOGL.O) YouTube is also planning to apply for an e-commerce license, two sources said, without specifying the type of permit planned. YouTube introduced in the U.S. a shopping service for creators to promote products and brands on the platform.翻译:两位消息人士称，Alphabet旗下的 YouTube 也计划申请电子商务许可证，但没有具体说明计划的许可证类型。 YouTube 在美国推出了一项购物服务，供创作者在该平台上推广产品和品牌。

A spokesperson for the company declined to comment.翻译:该公司发言人拒绝置评。

TikTok and YouTube's plans to apply for e-commerce permits in Indonesia have not been previously reported.翻译:此前并未报道过 TikTok 和 YouTube 计划在印度尼西亚申请电子商务许可证。

Facebook and Instagram owner Meta Platforms applied this month for a type of e-commerce license allowing the promotion of goods on its platforms but no direct e-commerce transactions, said the Indonesian trade ministry's director general of domestic trade, Isy Karim.翻译:印度尼西亚贸易部国内贸易总干事伊西·卡里姆 (Isy Karim) 表示，Facebook 和 Instagram 所有者 Meta Platforms 本月申请了一种电子商务许可证，允许在其平台上促销商品，但不允许进行直接电子商务交易。

The permit would enable vendors to advertise goods and do market surveys but no in-app transactions, Isy said, adding that Meta is seeking the permit for its Facebook, WhatsApp and Instagram apps.翻译:Isy 表示，该许可证将使供应商能够为商品做广告并进行市场调查，但不能进行应用内交易。他补充说，Meta 正在为其 Facebook、WhatsApp 和 Instagram 应用程序寻求许可证。

Meta did not respond to requests for comment.翻译:Meta 没有回应置评请求。

YouTube and TikTok have not approached authorities about applying, Isy said. If TikTok were to apply, he said, it would have to be a domestic unit of the company.翻译:Isy 表示，YouTube 和 TikTok 尚未就申请事宜与当局联系。他说，如果 TikTok 要申请，它必须是该公司的国内子公司。

Reporting by Stanley Widianto and Fanny Potkin; Editing by William Mallard翻译:斯坦利·维迪安托和范妮·波特金的报道；威廉·马拉德编辑

item.title: 早间出价：领先欧洲央行、GDP 和亚马逊 5%
item.description:
A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望

The selloff in Wall Street stocks is starting to snowball as even megacap tech beats get batted away by a fresh wave of bond market turbulence and Middle East tension.翻译:华尔街股票的抛售开始像滚雪球一样越滚越大，即使是大型科技股也受到新一波债券市场动荡和中东紧张局势的打击。

Even though Facebook parent Meta (META.O) beat expectations for third-quarter profits and revenue and a 2024 outlook, its stock dropped almost 4% out of hours as it suggested the conflict in Israel and Gaza could dampen fourth-quarter sales.翻译:尽管 Facebook 母公司Meta (META.O)的第三季度利润和收入以及 2024 年前景超出了预期，但其股价在盘后下跌了近 4%，因为该公司暗示以色列和加沙的冲突可能会抑制第四季度的销售。

But with Google-parent Alphabet plunging 9% on Wednesday after its results, appetite for Big Tech was absent and the Nasdaq (.IXIC) lost 2.4% - its biggest one-day loss since February. The Philadelphia SE Semiconductor index (.SOX) plummeted 4.1% in its biggest plunge of the year.翻译:但随着谷歌母公司Alphabet在公布业绩后周三暴跌 9%，人们对大型科技公司的兴趣消失，纳斯达克指数(.IXIC)下跌 2.4%，这是自 2 月份以来的最大单日跌幅。费城 SE 半导体指数(.SOX)暴跌 4.1%，创下今年最大跌幅。

With Amazon due to report later, there was no respite for the so-called 'Magnificent Seven' Wall St behemoths or the wider market ahead of Thursday's open. S&P500 and Nasdaq futures were down heavily overnight and the world stocks index (.MIWD00000PUS) at its lowest since March.翻译:由于亚马逊稍后将发布报告，在周四开盘之前，所谓的“七巨头”华尔街巨头或更广泛的市场没有喘息的机会。标准普尔 500 指数和纳斯达克期货隔夜大幅下跌，世界股指(.MIWD00000PUS)跌至 3 月份以来的最低水平。

Even as Israel appeared to prepare for an imminent ground invasion of Gaza, a renewed spike in long-term borrowing rates rankled alongside it - with 10-year Treasury yields rising back to within a whisker of the 16-year peak of 5% it hit earlier in the week.翻译:尽管以色列似乎正在为即将到来的对加沙的地面入侵做准备，但长期借款利率的再次飙升也随之而来——10年期国债收益率回升至16年最高点5%的水平。本周早些时候。

The dollar (.DXY) surged to its highest level in almost three weeks, breaching 150 yen to hit its highest against the Japanese currency in more than a year - with no sign of Bank of Japan intervention so far.翻译:美元(.DXY)飙升至近三周来的最高水平，突破 150 日元，兑日元触及一年多以来的最高水平 - 迄今为止没有日本央行干预的迹象。

A busy week of debt auctions continues with 7-year note sales later as markets brace for confirmation that U.S. third-quarter economic growth accelerated to more than 5% - more than twice the rate in the June quarter.翻译:忙碌的一周债务拍卖继续进行，随后将进行 7 年期国债销售，市场准备确认美国第三季度经济增长加速至 5% 以上，是 6 月份季度增速的两倍多。

Fresh evidence of that strength was seen on Wednesday as new single-family home sales surged to a 19-month high last month even as mortgage rates hit 23-year peaks near 8%.翻译:周三，新的单户住宅销售量飙升至 19 个月高点，尽管抵押贷款利率触及 23 年来的最高点，接近 8%，周三，这一强劲势头得到了新的证明。

The bond market seemed unimpressed even as the U.S. House of Representatives ended a three week hiatus by electing Republican Mike Johnson, a conservative with little leadership experience, as speaker.翻译:尽管美国众议院选举缺乏领导经验的保守派共和党人迈克·约翰逊(Mike Johnson)作为议长，结束了为期三周的休会，但债券市场似乎并未受到影响。

In his speech, Johnson said he would establish a bipartisan commission to tackle the $33 trillion national debt. But his first task will be to respond to President Joe Biden's $106 billion spending request for aid to Israel, Ukraine and border security.翻译:约翰逊在讲话中表示，他将成立一个两党委员会来解决 33 万亿美元的国债问题。但他的首要任务将是回应乔·拜登总统提出的 1060 亿美元的支出请求，以援助以色列、乌克兰和边境安全。

Equally, there was little bond market cheer from news the United Auto Workers union reached a tentative labor deal with Ford (F.N) - as the proposed accord provides a record 25% wage hike over the 4-1/2-year contract.翻译:同样， 美国汽车工人联合会与福特汽车公司 (FN)达成临时劳工协议的消息也没有给债券市场带来多少欢乐，因为拟议的协议规定在 4-1/2 年合同的基础上创纪录地增加 25% 的工资。

European stocks (.STOXXE) and the euro dropped sharply, meantime, as regional banking shares were hit ahead of the European Central Bank's policy decision later in the day.翻译:与此同时，欧洲股市（.STOXXE）和欧元大幅下跌，因为地区银行股在欧洲央行当天晚些时候做出政策决定之前受到打击。

The ECB is expected to signal the end of its interest rate tightening campaign amid mounting signs of economic weakness in the bloc, but markets are watching closely for information on its balance sheet rundown and possible quicker reduction of its bond stash.翻译:由于欧元区经济疲软的迹象越来越多，预计欧洲央行将结束其利率紧缩行动，但市场正在密切关注有关其资产负债表缩减以及可能更快减少债券储备的信息。

Standard Chartered shares (STAN.L) slumped 11.3% and were set for their worst day in over three years as the lender's third-quarter pre-tax profit dropped 33% amid losses in China. BNP Paribas (BNPP.PA) fell 4.1% on reporting a fall in trading revenue.翻译:渣打银行(STAN.L)股价下跌 11.3%，预计将遭遇三年多来最糟糕的一天，该银行第三季度税前利润因中国业务亏损而下降 33%。法国巴黎银行(BNPP.PA)因交易收入下降而下跌 4.1%。

Despite confirmation of a default by ailing property developer Country Garden, Chinese stocks seemed to buck the global trend and ended marginally higher after the week's slew of stimulus measures - including state fund buying and a plan to issue 1 trillion yuan ($137 billion) of sovereign bonds.翻译:尽管陷入困境的房地产开发商碧桂园确认违约，但在本周采取一系列刺激措施（包括国家基金购买和发行 1 万亿元人民币（1,370 亿美元）主权债券的计划）后，中国股市似乎逆全球趋势收市小幅走高。债券。

Key developments that should provide more direction to U.S. markets later on Thursday:翻译:周四晚些时候的关键事态发展将为美国市场提供更多方向：

* European Central Bank policy decision and press conference. Turkish Central Bank policy decision翻译:* 欧洲央行政策决定和新闻发布会。土耳其央行政策决定

* U.S. Q3 GDP; Sept durable goods orders, advance trade balance, pending home sales and wholesale/retail inventories; Kansas City Fed Oct business survey; weekly jobless claims翻译:* 美国第三季度GDP； 9月耐用品订单、预付贸易平衡、待售房屋销售和批发/零售库存；堪萨斯城联储十月商业调查；每周申请失业救济人数

* U.S. corporate earnings: Amazon, Intel, UPS, Honeywell, Merck, Comcast, Mastercard, Capital One, Principal Financial, Chipotle, Verisign, First Energy, Mohawk, Eastman Chemical, Weyerhauser, Camden Property, AO Smith, Bunge, Hasbro, PG&E, Bristol-Myers Squibb, Boston Scientific, Hershey, Northrop Grumman etc翻译:* 美国企业盈利：亚马逊、英特尔、UPS、霍尼韦尔、默克、康卡斯特、万事达卡、第一资本、信安金融、Chipotle、Verisign、First Energy、Mohawk、Eastman Chemical、Weyerhauser、Camden Property、AO Smith、Bunge、Hasbro、PG&E 、百时美施贵宝、波士顿科学、好时、诺斯罗普格鲁门等

* U.S. Treasury auctions 7-year notes and 4-week bills翻译:* 美国财政部拍卖7年期国债和4周期国债

* Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi meets U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken in Washington翻译:* 中国外交部长王毅在华盛顿会见美国国务卿布林肯

* European Union summit in Brussels翻译:* 布鲁塞尔欧盟峰会

item.title: 渣打银行股价因中国遭受近 10 亿美元损失而暴跌
item.description:
Summary:
  • Shares fall 12% before temporary trading halt翻译:暂时停牌前股价下跌 12%
  • Bank books $700 mln hit on Bohai Bank stake翻译:渤海银行股权损失7亿美元
  • China slowdown triggers $186 mln real estate loss翻译:中国经济放缓引发1.86亿美元房地产损失

StanChart shares fell 12% in London on Thursday before trading was briefly halted, after it announced its profit unexpectedly plunged by a third due to a nearly $1 billion combined hit from its exposure to China's real estate and banking sectors.翻译:周四，渣打银行股价在伦敦下跌 12%，之后交易短暂暂停，此前该公司宣布，由于中国房地产和银行业风险敞口合计损失近 10 亿美元，其利润意外暴跌三分之一。

The bank said pre-tax profit dropped 33% in the third quarter, far worse than analyst estimates, as it booked a $700 million impairment from its stake in China Bohai Bank (9668.HK), and a $186 million charge from Chinese commercial real estate.翻译:该银行表示，第三季度税前利润下降了 33%，远低于分析师预期，因为该行因持有的渤海银行（9668.HK）股份计提了 7 亿美元的减值，并从中国商业房地产中扣除了 1.86 亿美元的费用。财产。

By 0919 GMT, Standard Chartered (STAN.L) shares were down 10.5%, set for their largest one-day fall since March last year, when Russia invaded Ukraine.翻译:截至格林威治标准时间 0919，渣打银行(STAN.L)股价下跌 10.5%，创下自去年 3 月俄罗斯入侵乌克兰以来的最大单日跌幅。

The U.K.-headquartered bank, which earns most of its revenue in Asia, booked July-September statutory pretax profit of $633 million. That compared with $996 million a year earlier and the $1.41 billion average of analyst estimates.翻译:这家总部位于英国的银行大部分收入来自亚洲，7月至9月的法定税前利润为6.33亿美元。相比之下，去年同期为 9.96 亿美元，分析师平均预期为 14.1 亿美元。

The hefty loss in China, where StanChart has based much of its expansion effort, underlines the challenge it faces to improve returns via exposure to the world's second-largest economy at a time of slowing growth and widening losses on loans.翻译:渣打银行大部分扩张工作都集中在中国，而中国的巨额亏损突显出，在经济增长放缓和贷款损失扩大之际，该公司在通过对世界第二大经济体的投资来提高回报方面面临着挑战。

StanChart said the hit on its 16% stake in China Bohai, a lender in the eastern coastal city of Tianjin in which it invested more than a decade ago, was due to lower forecast interest rates and decreased lending margins.翻译:渣打银行表示，其所持有的渤海银行16%的股份受到影响是由于预测利率下降和贷款利润率下降。渤海银行是一家位于东部沿海城市天津的银行，十多年前就投资了该银行。

Bohai booked a 17.8% fall in January-June net interest income, leading to a nearly 7% decline in its overall profit, according to company filings.翻译:公司文件显示，1-6月渤海净利息收入下降17.8%，导致其整体利润下降近7%。

"We took a couple of impairment charges a year and a bit ago, and we have taken the extra impairment charge as you can see today," Chief Financial Officer Andy Halford told reporters.翻译:首席财务官安迪·哈尔福德 (Andy Halford) 告诉记者：“一年多前，我们收取了几笔减值费用，现在您可以看到，我们已经收取了额外的减值费用。”

"That is reflective of the fact that particularly its own net interest margin has been weaker," he said.翻译:“这反映了一个事实，特别是其自身的净息差一直较弱，”他表示。

A raft of government easing measures has done little to allay China's economic fragility as a crisis in its property market deepens with high-profile debt-repayment defaults.翻译:随着中国房地产市场危机因高调的债务偿还违约而加深，政府采取的一系列宽松措施对缓解中国经济的脆弱性收效甚微。

StanChart's Chinese real estate exposure totalled $2.7 billion as of the end of September, down $200 million from the previous quarter.翻译:截至9月底，渣打银行的中国房地产风险总额为27亿美元，比上一季度减少2亿美元。

Shares in rival HSBC (HSBA.L), which similarly has exposure to Chinese real estate and to the bank sector via its stake in Bank of Communications (601328.SS), were down only 2% on Thursday as investors saw limited read-across between the two.翻译:竞争对手汇丰银行(HSBA.L)的股价周四仅下跌 2%，因为投资者的解读有限，该公司同样通过持有交通银行(601328.SS) 的股份涉足中国房地产和银行业。两者之间。

StanChart, which has been the subject of repeated takeover speculation in the last decade, saw renewed interest earlier this year after First Abu Dhabi Bank (FAB) in January said it had considered but abandoned a bid.翻译:渣打银行在过去十年中不断成为收购猜测的对象，今年早些时候，第一阿布扎比银行 (FAB) 在 1 月份表示曾考虑但放弃收购后，今年早些时候，渣打银行再次引起了人们的兴趣。

StanChart has recently had "no contact" with FAB, Chief Financial Officer Andy Halford told reporters on a conference call on Thursday.翻译:渣打银行首席财务官安迪·哈尔福德 (Andy Halford) 在周四的电话会议上对记者表示，最近与 FAB“没有任何联系”。

'SOLID PERFORMANCE' IN OTHER BUSINESS

StanChart said it is confident of hitting its return-on-tangible-equity targets of 10% this year and 11% in 2024, but downgraded some other performance forecasts for the year.翻译:渣打银行表示，有信心今年实现 10%、2024 年 11% 的有形股本回报率目标，但下调了今年其他一些业绩预测。

"Investors were expecting a clean set of third quarter numbers, and we do not have that today," said Jefferies analyst Joe Dickerson.翻译:杰富瑞 (Jefferies) 分析师乔·迪克森 (Joe Dickerson) 表示：“投资者原本期待第三季度的数据清晰，但今天却没有。”

The "silver lining" for investors was the bank's underlying business performance - excluding impairment charges - remained solid, Dickerson said in a note to clients.翻译:迪克森在给客户的一份报告中表示，投资者的“一线希望”是该银行的基本业务业绩（不包括减值费用）仍然稳健。

Net interest margin, a measure of return on lending, will now "approach" 1.7 percentage points rather than be "around" that level, StanChart said.翻译:渣打银行表示，衡量贷款回报率的净息差现在将“接近”1.7个百分点，而不是“接近”该水平。

Rate-sensitive businesses received a boost, with income from transaction banking - the bulk in cash management services - increasing 42% and retail products reporting 17% growth.翻译:利率敏感型业务得到提振，交易银行业务收入（现金管理服务的主要部分）增长了 42%，零售产品收入增长了 17%。

In the financial markets trading division, income fell 8% as reduced market volatility curbed client appetite for trading.翻译:在金融市场交易部门，由于市场波动性减弱抑制了客户的交易兴趣，收入下降了 8%。

item.title: 中国称美国无权介入中菲问题
item.description:
The United States does not have the right to get involved in problems between China and the Philippines, the Chinese foreign ministry said on Thursday, as tensions simmer over conflicts in disputed waters of the South China Sea.翻译:中国外交部周四表示，美国无权介入中国和菲律宾之间的问题，因为南海争议海域的冲突引发紧张局势。

"The U.S. is not party to the South China Sea issue, it has no right to get involved in a problem between China and the Philippines," said ministry spokesperson Mao Ning at a regular press briefing when asked about the U.S. saying it will defend the Philippines.翻译:当被问及美国表示将捍卫南海问题时，外交部发言人毛宁在例行记者会上表示：“美国不是南海问题当事方，无权介入中菲之间的问题。”菲律宾。

China and the Philippines have had several high-profile confrontations in the South China Sea, most notably in disputed waters around the Second Thomas Shoal, part of the Spratly Islands.翻译:中国和菲律宾在南海发生了几次引人注目的对抗，尤其是在仁爱礁（南沙群岛的一部分）周围有争议的海域。

Last Sunday, a Chinese vessel collided with a Philippine boat, with Manila condemning "in the strongest degree" the "dangerous blocking manoeuvres" of the vessel.翻译:上周日，一艘中国船只与一艘菲律宾船只相撞，马尼拉“最强烈地”谴责该船的“危险拦截动作”。

"The U.S. promise of defending the Philippines must not hurt China's sovereignty and maritime interests in the South China Sea, and it also must not enable and encourage the illegal claims of the Philippines," Mao said.翻译:毛泽东说：“美国保卫菲律宾的承诺不能损害中国在南海的主权和海洋利益，也不能纵容和鼓励菲律宾的非法主张。”

A spokesperson for the Philippine foreign ministry did not immediately respond to a request for comment.翻译:菲律宾外交部发言人没有立即回应置评请求。

U.S. President Joe Biden said on Wednesday at the White House that America's commitment to Philippines defence remains "iron-clad," after accusing China of acting "dangerously and unlawfully" in the South China Sea.翻译:美国总统乔·拜登周三在白宫指责中国在南海采取“危险且非法”的行为后，表示美国对菲律宾防务的承诺仍然是“铁定的”。

"Any attack on the Filipino aircraft, vessels, or armed forces will invoke ... our Mutual Defence Treaty with the Philippines," Biden said in remarks during a joint meeting with Australia's prime minister.翻译:拜登在与澳大利亚总理的联合会议上表示：“对菲律宾飞机、船只或武装部队的任何攻击都将援引……我们与菲律宾的共同防御条约。”

The United States and the Philippines recently agreed on new guidelines for their 1951 Mutual Defence Treaty. The guidelines now specifically mention that mutual defence commitments would be invoked if there were an armed attack on either country “anywhere in the South China Sea”.翻译:美国和菲律宾最近就 1951 年共同防御条约的新指导方针达成一致。该指导方针现在特别提到，如果“南海任何地方”对任何一个国家进行武装袭击，都将援引共同防御承诺。

Reporting by Eduardo Baptista and Bernard Orr; Editing by Muralikumar Anantharaman and Michael Perry翻译:爱德华多·巴普蒂斯塔和伯纳德·奥尔报道；穆拉利库马尔·阿南塔拉曼和迈克尔·佩里编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国最年轻航天员启程前往空间站
item.description:
The youngest-ever crew of Chinese astronauts departed for China's space station on Thursday, paving the way for a new generation of "taikonauts" to advance the country's space ambitions in the future.翻译:周四，有史以来最年轻的中国航天员启程前往中国空间站，为新一代“航天员”推进中国未来的太空雄心铺平了道路。

The spacecraft Shenzhou-17, or "Divine Vessel", and its three passengers lifted off atop a Long March-2F rocket from the Jiuquan Satellite Launch Centre in northwest China.翻译:神舟十七号飞船及其三名乘客乘坐长征二号F火箭从中国西北部的酒泉卫星发射中心升空。

Leading the six-month mission was former air force pilot Tang Hongbo, 48, who was on the first crewed mission to the space station in 2021.翻译:领导这项为期六个月的任务的是 48 岁的前空军飞行员唐洪波，他于 2021 年执行了首次载人空间站任务。

His return to the orbiting outpost Tiangong, or "Celestial Palace" in Chinese, also set a new record for the shortest interval between two spaceflight missions by taikonauts - coined from the Chinese word for space - suggesting a faster rotation of taikonauts in coming years.翻译:他返回轨道前哨站天宫，也创下了航天员两次航天任务之间最短间隔的新纪录，这意味着未来几年航天员的轮换速度会更快。

Tang, from China's second batch of astronauts in 2010, had to wait more than a decade before he was picked for his inaugural spaceflight in 2021.翻译:唐是2010年中国第二批航天员，等了十多年才被选中参加2021年的首次航天飞行。

By contrast, his fellow Shenzhou-17 crew members Tang Shengjie, 33, and Jiang Xinlin, 35, both travelling to space for the first time, joined China's third batch of astronauts in September 2020.翻译:相比之下，神舟十七号机组成员唐胜杰（33岁）和蒋新林（35岁）都是首次进入太空，于2020年9月加入中国第三批航天员。

China has already kickstarted the selection process for the fourth batch of astronauts, seeking candidates with doctoral degrees in disciplines from biology, physics and chemistry to biomedical engineering and astronomy.翻译:中国已经启动了第四批航天员的选拔工作，寻找具有生物学、物理化学、生物医学工程和天文学等学科博士学位的候选人。

It is also opening the process to applicants from Hong Kong and Macau for the first time.翻译:它还首次向香港和澳门的申请人开放该流程。

The first and second batches of astronauts were all former air force pilots, like Tang, who joined the People's Liberation Army in 1995 at age 20.翻译:第一批和第二批宇航员都是前空军飞行员，比如唐，1995年20岁时加入解放军。

FOREIGN ASTRONAUTS

The selection and training process will commence soon for foreign astronauts looking to participate in joint flights to Tiangong, a senior official on China's manned space program said this year.翻译:中国载人航天计划的一位高级官员今年表示，对于希望参加天宫联合飞行的外国宇航员的选拔和培训过程即将开始。

But as much as China is showcasing its efforts to internationalise its space missions, its space program has distinct Chinese characteristics, at least on Tiangong.翻译:但尽管中国正在展示其太空任务国际化的努力，但其太空计划具有鲜明的中国特色，至少在天宫上是这样。

In a departure from the NASA-led International Space Station (ISS), where English is the working language, only Chinese is used on Tiangong, making Chinese-language skills a key criteria for foreign participants.翻译:与美国宇航局领导的国际空间站（ISS）以英语为工作语言不同，天宫号上只使用中文，这使得中文能力成为外国参与者的关键标准。

Tiangong has become a symbol of China's growing confidence in its space endeavours after being shut out of the ISS program for decades. China is banned by U.S. law from any collaboration, direct or indirect, with NASA.翻译:在被排除在国际空间站计划之外数十年后，天宫号已成为中国对其太空事业信心不断增强的象征。美国法律禁止中国与美国宇航局进行任何直接或间接的合作。

Tiangong, completed in late 2022, can house a maximum of three astronauts at an orbital altitude of up to 450 km (280 miles) and will have an operational lifespan of more than 15 years.翻译:天宫号于 2022 年底竣工，最多可容纳三名宇航员，轨道高度高达 450 公里（280 英里）， 使用寿命将超过 15 年。

The Shenzhou-17 astronauts will replace the Shenzhou-16 crew, who arrived at Tiangong at the end of May.翻译:神舟十七号航天员将接替五月底抵达天宫的神舟十六号宇航员。

The Shenzhou-16 crew, consisting of veteran astronaut Jing Haipeng, Zhu Yangzhu and Gui Haichao, is scheduled to return to earth on Oct. 31.翻译:由老航天员景海鹏、朱扬柱、桂海超组成的神舟十六号机组人员计划于10月31日返回地球。

Zhu and Gui, both in their 30s, are from China's third batch of astronauts.翻译:朱和桂都是30多岁的人，都是中国第三批航天员。

Shenzhou-17 marks China's 12th crewed mission since Yang Liwei's solo spaceflight in October 2003, the first Chinese national in space.翻译:神舟十七号是继2003年10月杨利伟单人航天飞行之后中国第12次载人飞行任务，杨利伟是中国第一个进入太空的人。

Reporting by Ryan Woo; Editing by Tom Hogue and Gerry Doyle翻译:瑞恩·吴 (Ryan Woo) 报道；汤姆·霍格和格里·多伊尔编辑
item.author: Ryan Woo

item.title: 中国月球研究站计划的伙伴国家
item.description:
Belarus this week joined China's International Lunar Research Station (ILRS) programme, the third country to sign up this month for a plan to eventually set up a permanently inhabited outpost on the moon's south pole.翻译:白俄罗斯本周加入了中国的国际月球研究站（ILRS）计划，这是本月签署计划的第三个国家，该计划最终将在月球南极建立一个永久居住的前哨基地。

Earlier in October, Pakistan and Azerbaijan joined the ILRS, a project jointly initiated by China and Russia in 2021 and widely seen as a rival to the U.S.-led Artemis programme.翻译:10 月初，巴基斯坦和阿塞拜疆加入了 ILRS，该项目由中国和俄罗斯于 2021 年联合发起，被广泛视为美国主导的阿尔忒弥斯计划的竞争对手。

Lunar missions this decade will establish a "basic" version of the research station, followed by more missions in the 2030s to construct a "full" version of the base.翻译:这十年的探月任务将建立一个“基本”版本的研究站，随后在 2030 年代将进行更多任务，以建造一个“完整”版本的基地。

By 2050, the ILRS is expected to be a fully operational station for lunar research, and potentially also a launch pad for crewed missions to other planets in the solar system.翻译:到 2050 年，ILRS 预计将成为月球研究的全面运行站，也有可能成为前往太阳系其他行星的载人任务的发射台。

Note: (*) denotes founding member翻译:注：(*)表示创始成员

Reporting by Ryan Woo; Editing by Emelia Sithole-Matarise翻译:瑞恩·吴 (Ryan Woo) 报道；编辑：埃米莉亚·西托尔-马塔里斯

item.title: 中国经济放缓加剧科技困境 WPP 再次下调前景
item.description:
Summary:
  • WPP cuts full-year forecast for second quarter in a row翻译:WPP 连续第二季度下调全年预期
  • Expects growth of 0.5-1.0, down from 1.5-3.0%翻译:预计增长 0.5-1.0%，低于 1.5-3.0%
  • Tech companies reluctant to spend, GroupM slows sharply翻译:科技公司不愿花钱，群邑大幅放缓
  • Shares fall as much as 5% to three-year low翻译:股价跌幅高达 5% 至三年来新低

Ad group WPP (WPP.L) cut its outlook for the second time in as many quarters on Thursday as tech clients continued to cut back on marketing, growth slowed sharply at its media buying agency GroupM and China disappointed.翻译:周四，广告集团 WPP (WPP.L)在多个季度内第二次下调了预期，原因是科技客户继续削减营销支出，其媒体购买机构群邑 (GroupM) 的增长大幅放缓，而中国市场令人失望。

The British company, whose agencies include Ogilvy, said it now expected like-for-like growth for 2023 of 0.5-1.0%, down from the 1.5-3.0% it forecast in August and the up to 5% it expected earlier in the year.翻译:这家代理机构包括奥美的英国公司表示，目前预计 2023 年同比增长率为 0.5-1.0%，低于 8 月份预测的 1.5-3.0% 和今年早些时候预测的高达 5% 。

"Our top-line performance in Q3 was below our expectations and continued to be impacted by the cautious spending trends we saw in Q2, particularly across technology clients with more impact from this felt in GroupM over the summer than the first half," CEO Mark Read said.翻译:首席执行官 Mark 表示：“我们第三季度的营收表现低于预期，并继续受到第二季度谨慎支出趋势的影响，尤其是科技客户，今年夏天群邑受到的影响比上半年更大。”读说。

WPP's like-for-like revenue less pass-through costs fell 0.6% in the quarter while the market had expected 1.0% growth.翻译:WPP 本季度的同比收入减去转嫁成本下降 0.6%，而市场预期增长 1.0%。

The performance trailed rivals Interpublic, which reported a 0.4% decrease, Omnicom, which recorded 3.3% growth, and Publicis, the strongest of the big four, with 5.3% growth.翻译:该业绩落后于竞争对手 Interpublic（下降 0.4%）、Omnicom（增长 3.3%）和阳狮（四大巨头中最强的）（增长 5.3%）。

Read noted that Meta, which published results on Wednesday, had reduced marketing spend by 24%.翻译:Read 指出，Meta 在周三公布了业绩，营销支出减少了 24%。

"Technology companies (...) are looking very carefully at their marketing expenses," he said in an interview. "But I do think in the long run that will correct itself."翻译:“科技公司（……）正在非常仔细地考虑他们的营销费用，”他在接受采访时表示。 “但我确实认为从长远来看，这种情况会自行纠正。”

Its shares fell as much as 5% to a three-year low.翻译:其股价跌幅高达 5%，跌至三年来的最低点。

Read said it was also a tougher quarter in China, where consumer spending had not returned as expected.翻译:里德表示，这对中国来说也是一个更加艰难的季度，消费者支出没有按预期恢复。

Analysts at Citi said it was striking that the step down was "not necessarily caused by an intensification of the pressures in the second quarter but by a broadening of pressure".翻译:花旗分析师表示，令人惊讶的是，此次下台“不一定是由于第二季度压力加剧，而是由于压力扩大”。

Growth at GroupM slowed sharply to 1.6% from 6.1% in the previous quarter, reflecting the impact of clients losses in the United States, as well as the technology slowdown, WPP said.翻译:WPP 表示，群邑的增长率从上一季度的 6.1% 大幅放缓至 1.6%，反映出美国客户流失以及技术放缓的影响。

WPP said this month it would merge Wunderman Thompson and VMLY&R to create the industry's largest creative agency.翻译:WPP 本月表示，将合并 Wunderman Thompson 和 VMLY&R，创建业内最大的创意机构。

Reporting by Paul Sandle; editing by William James and Jason Neely翻译:保罗·桑德尔报道；威廉·詹姆斯和杰森·尼利编辑

item.title: 中国称石墨出口限制并非针对特定行业
item.description:
China's commerce ministry said on Thursday that recently announced restrictions on graphite exports are not targeted at any specific sector.翻译:中国商务部周四表示，最近宣布的石墨出口限制不针对任何特定行业。

A ministry spokeswoman was responding to a question at a regular briefing on the purpose of measures requiring export licences for some graphite products from Dec. 1.翻译:该部发言人在例行新闻发布会上回答了有关从 12 月 1 日起对某些石墨产品要求出口许可证的措施的目的的问题。

item.title: 英国副首相：中国接受英国人工智能峰会邀请
item.description:
China has accepted Britain's invitation to attend a global summit on artificial intelligence next week, Deputy Prime Minister Oliver Dowden said on Thursday.翻译:英国副首相奥利弗·道登周四表示，中国已接受英国邀请，出席下周举行的全球人工智能峰会。

"It is the case they've accepted, but we will wait to see everyone who actually turns up at the summit," Dowden told the BBC. "As things stands, yes, we do expect them to come."翻译:道登告诉英国广播公司：“他们已经接受了这种情况，但我们将等待看到真正出现在峰会上的每个人。” “就目前情况而言，是的，我们确实希望他们来。”

Britain is bringing together representatives of AI companies, political leaders and experts on Nov. 1-2 to discuss what some see as the risks posed by AI, with an aim of building an international consensus on its safe development.翻译:英国将于 11 月 1 日至 2 日召集人工智能公司代表、政治领导人和专家，讨论一些人认为的人工智能带来的风险，旨在就人工智能的安全发展达成国际共识。

item.title: Stellantis以16亿美元入股零跑汽车，重启中国业务
item.description:
Summary:
  • Stellantis to acquire 21% stake in EV maker Leapmotor翻译:Stellantis将收购电动汽车制造商零跑汽车21%的股份
  • JV to build and sell Leapmotor products outside China翻译:合资公司将在中国境外生产和销售零跑汽车产品
  • Deal gives Stellantis crucial foothold in China翻译:这笔交易为Stellantis在中国奠定了重要的立足点
  • Leapmotor shares slide 11%, reversing initial 11% jump翻译:零跑汽车股价下跌11%，扭转了最初11%的涨幅

Stellantis said on Thursday it is buying a 21% stake in EV maker Leapmotor in a $1.6 billion deal that will give it a fresh shot in China and the smaller Chinese carmaker a European foothold.翻译:Stellantis周四表示，将以16亿美元的交易收购电动汽车制造商零跑汽车21%的股份，这将使其在中国获得新的机会，并使这家规模较小的中国汽车制造商在欧洲站稳脚跟。

Legacy international carmakers are playing catch-up in the shift to electric vehicles and the deal gives Stellantis (STLAM.MI) access to Leapmotor's advanced technology.翻译:传统的国际汽车制造商正在向电动汽车转型中追赶，这笔交易使 Stellantis (STLAM.MI)能够获得零跑汽车的先进技术。

Meanwhile, a growing number of Chinese EV makers are launching lower-cost models across Europe.翻译:与此同时，越来越多的中国电动汽车制造商正在欧洲推出低成本车型。

"The Chinese offensive is visible everywhere," Stellantis CEO Carlos Tavares told reporters. "With this deal we can benefit from it rather than being the victims of it."翻译:Stellantis 首席执行官卡洛斯·塔瓦雷斯 (Carlos Tavares) 对记者表示：“中国的攻势随处可见。” “通过这项协议，我们可以从中受益，而不是成为受害者。”

Stellantis, formed at the start of 2021 through the merger of France's PSA with Fiat Chrysler (FCA), has struggled to sell cars in China and has sought a reset in the country, where it has a joint venture with Dongfeng Motor Group (0489.HK).翻译:Stellantis 成立于 2021 年初，由法国 PSA 与菲亚特克莱斯勒 (FCA) 合并而成，该公司一直难以在中国销售汽车，并寻求在中国重新定位，该公司与东风汽车集团(0489.香港） 。

The group, whose brands include Fiat and Peugeot, said a year ago it was closing its joint venture with Guangzhou Automobile Group (601238.SS) that makes Jeeps in China.翻译:该集团旗下品牌包括菲亚特和标致，一年前表示将关闭与广汽集团（601238.SS）在中国生产吉普车的合资企业。

Its new deal follows a tie-up between Volkswagen (VOWG_p.DE) and Xpeng (9868.HK) announced in July which heralded a new era of automotive alliances in China and reflects how the country has emerged as a global centre of EV technology.翻译:继大众汽车(VOWG_p.DE)和小鹏汽车(9868.HK) 在 7 月宣布合作之后，这项新交易预示着中国汽车联盟的新时代，并反映了中国如何成为全球电动汽车技术中心。

As part of a joint venture where Stellantis will hold a 51%stake, the Chrysler parent will have exclusive rights to export, sale and manufacture Zhejiang Leapmotor Technology's (9863.HK) products outside Greater China.翻译:作为Stellantis将持有51%股权的合资企业的一部分，克莱斯勒母公司将拥有在大中华区以外出口、销售和制造浙江零跑科技（9863.HK）产品的独家权利。

Some analysts were sceptical that such minority-stake partnerships would help established foreign auto brands revive their declining fortunes in China.翻译:一些分析师对这种少数股权合作能否帮助老牌外国汽车品牌重振其在中国不断下滑的命运表示怀疑。

"Small investments that allow them access to newer technology that they're not able to develop in-house doesn't seem like ... the silver bullet they're hoping it is," said Tu Le, founder of Beijing-based advisory firm Sino Auto Insights.翻译:北京咨询公司创始人涂乐表示：“让他们获得无法自行开发的新技术的小额投资似乎并不是他们所希望的灵丹妙药。”信诺汽车洞察公司。

Bill Russo, CEO of Shanghai-based advisory firm Automobility, agreed that "successful automotive partnerships are few in number, and often dissolve when the interests diverge."翻译:上海咨询公司 Automobility 的首席执行官比尔·鲁索 (Bill Russo) 也认为，“成功的汽车合作伙伴关系数量很少，而且往往会在利益出现分歧时解散。”

Stellantis has been concerned about growing competition from cheap Chinese EVs in Europe, a worry shared by the European Commission which launched an anti-subsidy probe into whether to set tariffs to shield European producers from Chinese imports.翻译:Stellantis一直担心欧洲廉价中国电动汽车的竞争日益激烈，欧盟委员会也有同样的担忧，该委员会对是否设定关税以保护欧洲生产商免受中国进口产品的影响发起了反补贴调查。

Tavares has in the past been a vocal critic of lower-cost Chinese imports into Europe, but told reporters the Leapmotor deal did not make Stellantis a "Trojan horse" and was critical of the EU probe.翻译:塔瓦雷斯过去一直直言不讳地批评中国向欧洲进口的低成本产品，但他告诉记者，零跑汽车的交易并没有使Stellantis成为“特洛伊木马”，并且对欧盟的调查持批评态度。

"We like competition. To start a probe is not the best way to tackle those questions," he said.翻译:“我们喜欢竞争。启动调查并不是解决这些问题的最佳方式，”他说。

Leapmotor shares fell 11% on Thursday on concerns about competition and the dilution of existing shareholdings, while shares in Stellantis were down 1.3% in early trade.翻译:由于对竞争和现有股权稀释的担忧，零跑汽车股价周四下跌 11%，而 Stellantis 股价早盘下跌 1.3%。

More than 40 EV brands are locked in a price war in China, triggered by Tesla (TSLA.O) earlier this year. Despite steep price cuts, sales are slowing due to weak consumer demand, putting margin pressure on automakers and their suppliers.翻译:今年早些时候，特斯拉(TSLA.O)引发了超过 40 个电动汽车品牌在中国陷入价格战。尽管大幅降价，但由于消费者需求疲软，销量仍在放缓，给汽车制造商及其供应商带来利润压力。

MORE PARTNERSHIPS

The Netherlands-incorporated joint venture is expected to start its export business in the second half of 2024, while Stellantis would have two seats on the Chinese firm's board.翻译:这家在荷兰注册成立的合资企业预计将于 2024 年下半年开始出口业务，而 Stellantis 将在这家中国公司的董事会中拥有两个席位。

The partnership will help Stellantis expand its EV lineup and meet a 2030 target of EVs accounting for all of its sales in Europe and half in the U.S.翻译:此次合作将帮助 Stellantis 扩大其电动汽车产品阵容，并实现 2030 年电动汽车销量占其欧洲全部销量和美国销量一半的目标

Leapmotor, ranked ninth by new energy vehicle sales in China, has been looking to license its EV platforms and other EV assets to established foreign automakers to generate cash. The company said last month it needed at least a five-fold increase in sales to survive in a consolidating EV industry.翻译:按中国新能源汽车销量排名第九的零跑汽车一直在寻求将其电动汽车平台和其他电动汽车资产授权给成熟的外国汽车制造商以赚取现金。该公司上个月表示，其销量需要至少增长五倍才能在不断整合的电动汽车行业中生存。

"We will certainly see more and more such partnerships as Chinese EV startups have a real urgency to survive and they are open to have foreign shareholders," said Yale Zhang, managing director at Shanghai-based consultancy Automotive Foresight.翻译:上海咨询公司Automotive Foresight董事总经理张耶鲁表示：“我们肯定会看到越来越多的此类合作伙伴关系，因为中国电动汽车初创企业确实迫切需要生存，而且它们对外国股东持开放态度。”

Under the deal, which is subject to regulatory approval, Leapmotor will issue 194.3 million shares to Stellantis for HK$43.8 per share, a premium of 19% to its last close, giving Stellantis about 21.07% of the total Hong Kong listed shares.翻译:根据该交易（尚待监管部门批准），零跑汽车将以每股 43.8 港元的价格向 Stellantis 发行 1.943 亿股股票，较上一交易日收盘价溢价 19%，从而使 Stellantis 占香港上市股份总数约 21.07%。

Shareholder Dahua (002236.SZ) said it would sell its 90 million Leapmotor shares to Stellantis as part of the deal.翻译:股东大华股份（002236.SZ）表示，作为交易的一部分，其将向Stellantis出售其持有的9000万股零跑汽车股份。

item.title: 中美会面为拜登-习近平峰会铺平道路，中东成为焦点
item.description:
Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi begins a long-anticipated visit to Washington on Thursday, as the U.S. and China seek to manage deep strategic differences and pave the way for an expected summit between presidents Joe Biden and Xi Jinping.翻译:中国外交部长王毅周四开始对华盛顿进行期待已久的访问，美国和中国寻求管理深刻的战略分歧，并为预期的乔·拜登总统和习近平总统之间的峰会铺平道路。

The Middle East war has added a fresh dynamic to the testy relationship between the superpowers and Washington is hoping Beijing could use its influence with Iran to help ensure the Israel-Hamas conflict does not spread to the wider region.翻译:中东战争给超级大国之间紧张的关系增添了新的活力，华盛顿希望北京能够利用其对伊朗的影响力来帮助确保以色列与哈马斯的冲突不会蔓延到更广泛的地区。

However, while both Beijing and Washington have spoken of looking for areas where they can work together, and Xi on Wednesday said China was willing to cooperate on global challenges, experts do not expect immediate progress.翻译:然而，尽管北京和华盛顿都谈到寻找可以合作的领域，而且习近平周三表示中国愿意就全球挑战进行合作，但专家预计不会立即取得进展。

The Biden administration's priority with Beijing has been to prevent intense competition between the world's two largest economies and disagreements on a host of issues from trade to Taiwan and the South China Sea veering into conflict.翻译:拜登政府与北京的首要任务是防止世界两大经济体之间的激烈竞争，以及防止在贸易、台湾和南海等一系列问题上的分歧演变成冲突。

U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken will welcome Wang at the State Department on Thursday, and he told the U.N. Security Council on Tuesday he would work with him to prevent the Middle East conflict from spreading.翻译:美国国务卿安东尼·布林肯将于周四在国务院欢迎王毅，并于周二向联合国安理会表示，他将与王毅合作，防止中东冲突蔓延。

Policy analysts in China and the U.S. say both sides share an interest in averting a wider war and that China, as a major oil purchaser, has considerable influence it could exert on Iran.翻译:中国和美国的政策分析人士表示，避免更广泛的战争符合双方的共同利益，而且中国作为主要石油购买国，可以对伊朗施加相当大的影响。

But whether Beijing will use it remains to be seen and experts say China may instead watch from the sidelines for a while longer.翻译:但北京是否会使用它还有待观察，专家表示，中国可能会继续观望一段时间。

"The Chinese certainly have an interest in preventing a direct U.S.-Iranian confrontation, as they are major oil consumers and that would spike prices," said Jon Alterman, head of the Middle East program at Washington's Center for Strategic and International Studies.翻译:华盛顿战略与国际研究中心中东项目负责人乔恩·奥尔特曼表示：“中国当然有兴趣阻止美伊直接对抗，因为他们是主要石油消费国，这会导致油价上涨。”

"Still, the Chinese are unlikely to do any heavy lifting here. I expect they'll want a seat at the table when the Israel-Gaza struggle gets resolved, but they don't feel much need or ability to hasten resolution."翻译:“不过，中国人不太可能在这里做任何繁重的工作。我预计，当以色列和加沙的斗争得到解决时，他们会希望在谈判桌上占有一席之地，但他们觉得没有太大的必要或能力来加速解决。”

WANG, BIDEN

Shi Yinhong, professor of international relations at Renmin University of China, said Beijing exerting its influence over Iran was "almost the only serious and practical U.S. expectation of China on the Middle East situation."翻译:中国人民大学国际关系教授时殷弘表示，北京对伊朗施加影响“几乎是美国对中国在中东局势上唯一严肃而实际的期望”。

However Shi added: "The U.S. position on Iran is far from acceptable to China and vice versa. Mutual compromise on this issue could be too limited and small to be of any significance."翻译:但史补充道：“美国在伊朗问题上的立场远不能为中国所接受，反之亦然。在这个问题上的相互妥协可能太有限、太小，没有任何意义。”

Washington has stressed the importance of China's ability to influence Iran. Blinken, during a whirlwind Middle East trip last week, spoke by phone to Wang and asked him to use Beijing's clout to ensure the conflict does not widen.翻译:华盛顿强调了中国影响伊朗的能力的重要性。布林肯上周在中东之行期间与王通电话，要求他利用北京的影响力确保冲突不会扩大。

China has called for restraint and a ceasefire in response to Israel's bombardment of Gaza in retaliation for an Oct. 7 attack by Hamas that Israel says killed 1,400 people. Retaliatory Israeli airstrikes have killed over 6,500 people, the health ministry in Hamas-ruled Gaza said on Wednesday. Reuters has not been able to independently verify the casualty figures of either side.翻译:中国呼吁各方保持克制并停火，以回应以色列对加沙的轰炸，以报复哈马斯 10 月 7 日发动的袭击，以色列称此次袭击造成 1,400 人死亡。哈马斯统治的加沙卫生部周三表示，以色列的报复性空袭已造成 6,500 多人死亡。路透社尚未能够独立核实双方的伤亡数字。

"China has been working tirelessly to promote the cessation of hostilities and the restoration of peace. We have been maintaining close communication with the parties concerned," China's U.N. Ambassador Zhang Jun said on Tuesday.翻译:中国驻联合国大使张军周二表示：“中国一直在为推动停止敌对行动、恢复和平作出不懈努力。我们一直与有关各方保持着密切沟通。”

Wang's visit to Washington comes after several top U.S. officials, including Blinken, visited Beijing in the past several months.翻译:王毅此次访问华盛顿之前，包括布林肯在内的多位美国高级官员在过去几个月访问了北京。

The veteran Chinese diplomat is expected to meet Biden's national security adviser, Jake Sullivan, on Friday. He is also expected to speak with Biden during his visit to the White House, according to two U.S. officials, although it is unclear how substantial their interaction will be.翻译:这位资深的中国外交官预计将于周五会见拜登的国家安全顾问杰克·沙利文。两名美国官员表示，预计他还将在拜登访问白宫期间与他进行交谈，尽管目前尚不清楚他们的互动会有多大。

PATH TO BIDEN-XI MEETING

Analysts expect the discussions to focus on preparations for an anticipated meeting between Biden and Xi on the sidelines of the summit of Asia Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) countries in San Francisco from Nov. 11 to 17. It would be Biden and Xi's first in-person meeting since a summit in Bali last November.翻译:分析人士预计，讨论的重点将是拜登和习近平将于 11 月 11 日至 17 日在旧金山举行的亚太经合组织 (APEC) 国家峰会期间举行的会晤的准备工作。这将是拜登和习近平的首次会面。自去年 11 月巴厘岛峰会以来，人们一直在聚会。

"There are substantive things to be ironed out and finalized," said Yun Sun, director of the China Program at Washington's Stimson Center. "(Wang) will be here for the negotiations only - the big deliverables will be reserved for the top leaders to announce."翻译:华盛顿史汀生中心中国项目主任孙云表示，“有一些实质性的事情需要解决和敲定。” “（王）来这里只是为了谈判——重要的成果将留待最高领导人宣布。”

On Wednesday, Xi said whether Washington and Beijing could establish the "right" way of getting along and managing their differences would be crucial to the world.翻译:周三，习近平表示，华盛顿和北京能否建立“正确”的相处方式并管理分歧，对世界至关重要。

The two sides go into APEC from different economic perspectives, with economic policy analysts saying the U.S. has weathered challenging global conditions after the COVID-19 pandemic somewhat better than China.翻译:双方从不同的经济角度讨论 APEC，经济政策分析师表示，在 COVID-19 大流行之后，美国在应对充满挑战的全球形势方面比中国要好一些。

U.S. and Chinese officials held a virtual meeting on Monday on macroeconomic developments, talks the U.S. called "productive and substantive" and China called "in-depth, frank and constructive."翻译:美国和中国官员周一就宏观经济发展举行了一次虚拟会议，美国称会谈“富有成效和实质性”，中国称会谈“深入、坦诚和建设性”。

U.S. officials said Taiwan and the South and East China Seas, where they accused Beijing of "destabilizing and dangerous actions" against rival territorial claimants, would also be on the agenda.翻译:美国官员表示，台湾和南海和东海问题也将被列入议程，他们指责北京针对敌对领土主张者采取“破坏稳定和危险的行动”。

They said re-establishing military-to-military ties with China remained a top U.S. priority to avoid unintended conflict.翻译:他们表示，与中国重建军事关系仍然是美国的首要任务，以避免意外冲突。

China's Global Times tabloid highlighted contradictions in relations.翻译:中国的《环球时报》小报强调了两国关系中的矛盾。

"Although Sino-U.S. interactions have seen a rapid recovery in different fields," the U.S. policy of attempting to "contain" China had not changed, it said, accusing Washington of "two-faced tactics" in which it "frequently takes various opportunities to discredit China and create friction."翻译:文章称，“虽然中美在不同领域的互动迅速恢复”，但美国试图“遏制”中国的政策没有改变，并指责华盛顿“频繁利用各种机会”，采取“双面策略”。抹黑中国、制造摩擦。”

Reporting by Humeyra Pamuk and David Brunnstrom in Washington and Laurie Chen in Beijing; Additional reporting by Trevor Hunnicutt Editing by Josie Kao翻译:Humeyra Pamuk 和 David Brunnstrom 在华盛顿以及 Laurie Chen 在北京的报道； Trevor Hunnicutt 的补充报道 Josie Kao 编辑

item.title: 亏损加剧野村重新评估中国大陆业务计划
item.description:
Nomura Holdings (8604.T) said on Thursday it is reassessing its mainland China business, as losses mount at its Shanghai-based securities joint venture in another blow to the top Japanese investment bank's global expansion strategy.翻译:野村控股(8604.T)周四表示，正在重新评估其中国大陆业务，因为其位于上海的合资证券公司亏损加剧，这对这家日本顶级投行的全球扩张战略造成了又一次打击。

Nomura's majority-owned joint venture has struggled to grow since its launch in 2019, dragged down by the pandemic and a slowing economy.翻译:野村控股的合资企业自 2019 年成立以来，受疫情和经济放缓的拖累，增长举步维艰。

In 2022, the joint venture lost 225 million yuan ($30.75 million), after losing 84 million yuan in 2021, according to Nomura's filings.翻译:野村证券的文件显示，继 2021 年亏损 8400 万元人民币之后，2022 年该合资企业亏损 2.25 亿元人民币（3075 万美元）。

"With a presence in China for over four decades since 1982, we have consistently sought to contribute to the development of the country's capital markets and service the evolving needs of clients," Nomura said in a statement.翻译:野村证券在一份声明中表示：“自 1982 年以来，我们在中国开展业务已超过四十年，我们始终致力于为中国资本市场的发展做出贡献，并满足客户不断变化的需求。”

"That strategy remains unchanged. Having now fully emerged from the pandemic, we are working constructively with our joint venture partners to determine the most viable path for our onshore business to achieve this long-term objective," it said.翻译:该公司表示：“这一战略保持不变。现在已经完全摆脱了疫情的影响，我们正在与合资伙伴进行建设性合作，以确定我们的陆上业务实现这一长期目标的最可行途径。”

Nomura's China joint venture headcount has dropped to 259 from 281 in July, far short of the original target of increasing it to 500 by this year.翻译:野村证券在中国的合资企业员工人数已从7月份的281人减少至259人，远未达到今年将其增加到500人的原定目标。

While Nomura declined to comment on the reason for the drop, Bloomberg, which first reported the news, said the joint venture has cut jobs and seen a number of departures following a management reshuffle earlier this year.翻译:虽然野村证券拒绝就业绩下降的原因发表评论，但最先报道这一消息的彭博社表示，在今年早些时候进行管理层改组后，该合资企业已经裁员，并出现了一些人离职。

The review comes as the Japanese investment bank is cutting its investment bankers in Hong Kong. Reuters reported that Nomura has laid off about 10 of its Hong Kong-based bankers, including some who were focused on China-related deals.翻译:此次审查是在这家日本投资银行正在裁减其在香港的投资银行家之际进行的。路透社报道称，野村证券已解雇了约 10 名驻香港银行家，其中包括一些专注于中国相关交易的银行家。

Leading U.S. and European banks, such as Goldman Sachs and Citigroup, have launched rounds of layoffs this year in their Asia investment banking units.翻译:高盛(Goldman Sachs)和花旗集团(Citigroup)等美国和欧洲领先银行今年已对其亚洲投行部门进行了多轮裁员。

Nomura received final regulatory approval to launch the joint venture, Nomura Orient International Securities, in 2019, as part of Beijing's move to open its financial sector up to foreign firms.翻译:野村证券于 2019 年获得监管部门的最终批准，成立合资企业野村东方国际证券，这是北京向外国公司开放金融业举措的一部分。

Its original plan called on the joint venture to initially focus on wealth management and eventually expand to wholesale businesses, including investment banking and trading.翻译:其最初的计划是，合资公司最初专注于财富管理，最终扩展到批发业务，包括投资银行和贸易。

The joint venture is 51% owned by Nomura, 24.9% by Orient International Holding, and 24.1% by Shanghai Huangpu Investment Holding Group.翻译:该合资公司由野村证券持股51%，东方国际控股持股24.9%，上海黄浦投资控股集团持股24.1%。

item.title: 澳大利亚警方在与中国有组织犯罪有关的洗钱行动中逮捕了七人
item.description:
Australian police have arrested seven members of an alleged Chinese crime syndicate for laundering hundreds of millions of dollars through one of the country's largest money remitters after a giant sting operation involving U.S. Homeland Security.翻译:澳大利亚警方逮捕了一个涉嫌中国犯罪集团的七名成员，罪名是在美国国土安全部参与的大规模诱捕行动后，通过该国最大的汇款机构之一洗钱数亿美元。

Police said on Thursday the Chinese Long River crime syndicate allegedly laundered A$229 million ($143 million) through the Changjiang Currency Exchange, one of the country's largest independently-owned remitters with dozens of shops nationwide, between 2020 and 2023.翻译:警方周四表示，中国长河犯罪集团涉嫌在 2020 年至 2023 年间通过长江货币交易所洗钱 2.29 亿澳元（合 1.43 亿美元）。长江货币交易所是中国最大的独立汇款机构之一，在全国拥有数十家商店。

More than 330 police and other specialists arrested seven alleged members of the syndicate, including four Chinese nationals, on Wednesday during 20 search warrants across five states.翻译:周三，超过 330 名警察和其他专家在五个州发出 20 次搜查令，逮捕了 7 名涉嫌该犯罪团伙的成员，其中包括 4 名中国公民。

“This alleged syndicate was operating in plain sight with shiny shopfronts across the country – it was not operating in the shadows like other money laundering organisations,” Australian Federal Police Eastern Command Assistant Commissioner Stephen Dametto said in a statement on Thursday.翻译:澳大利亚联邦警察东部司令部助理局长史蒂芬·达梅托（Stephen Dametto）周四在一份声明中表示：“这个涉嫌犯罪集团在全国各地都有光鲜亮丽的店面，在众目睽睽之下进行活动，它不像其他洗钱组织那样在暗处运作。”

Investigators suspicions were first raised when the exchange opened new branches during COVID despite the pandemic meaning many of its international tourist and student customers had returned home, according to Dametto.翻译:达梅托表示，调查人员首次提出怀疑是在该交易所在新冠疫情期间开设新分行时，尽管大流行意味着许多国际游客和学生客户已经回国。

A formal investigation, codenamed Operation Avarus-Nightwolf began in August 2022 with the help of six other agencies, including the U.S. Department of Homeland Security Investigations.翻译:在包括美国国土安全调查部在内的其他六个机构的帮助下，一项代号为“阿瓦鲁斯-夜狼行动”的正式调查于 2022 年 8 月开始。

Police allege the syndicate camouflaged the proceeds of cyber scams, illicit goods trafficking and other crime within the exchange's mostly lawful daily transactions, which were as high as A$100 million.翻译:警方称，该犯罪团伙在该交易所大部分合法的日常交易中掩盖了网络诈骗、非法商品贩运和其他犯罪的收益，金额高达 1 亿澳元。

The proceeds allegedly funded an extravagant lifestyle of expensive restaurants, private jets and luxury homes, one valued at more than A$10 million. Police have quarantined more than A$50 million in assets.翻译:据称，所得收益用于资助奢侈的生活方式，包括昂贵的餐厅、私人飞机和豪华住宅，其中一套价值超过 1000 万澳元。警方已查封超过 5000 万澳元的资产。

Police also alleged the syndicate had purchased fake passports, valued at A$200,000 each, in case members needed to flee Australia.翻译:警方还指控该集团购买了每本价值 20 万澳元的假护照，以防成员需要逃离澳大利亚。

The seven arrested, aged between 35 to 40, will appear in a Melbourne court on Thursday.翻译:七名被捕者年龄在 35 岁至 40 岁之间，将于周四在墨尔本法庭出庭。

($1 = 1.5931 Australian dollars)翻译:（1 美元 = 1.5931 澳元）

item.title: 特斯拉供应商西拉预计在中国出口禁令之前购买更多石墨
item.description:
Australian producer Syrah Resources (SYR.AX) on Thursday said it expects buyers outside of China to step up their purchases of natural graphite before stricter export controls on the battery material came into effect on December 1.翻译:澳大利亚生产商 Syrah Resources (SYR.AX)周四表示，预计中国以外的买家将在 12 月 1 日对电池材料实施更严格的出口管制之前加大对天然石墨的采购。

China, the world's largest graphite producer and exporter, will require export permits as of Dec. 1 for some graphite products, including spherical graphite used by electric vehicle makers.翻译:中国是全球最大的石墨生产国和出口国，自12月1日起，部分石墨产品将需要出口许可证，其中包括电动汽车制造商使用的球形石墨。

Syrah, which has a supply deal with Tesla (TSLA.O), mines graphite at its Balama operations in Mozambique and is building a plant in Louisiana where it will produce active anode material (AAM) for batteries. In May, it paused mining at Balama after oversupply hit prices.翻译:Syrah 与特斯拉(TSLA.O)签订了供应协议，在莫桑比克的巴拉马工厂开采石墨，并正在路易斯安那州建设一家工厂，生产电池活性阳极材料 (AAM)。 5 月份，由于供应过剩影响了价格，该公司暂停了巴拉马 (Balama) 的开采。

The export controls could mean that automakers and suppliers of battery materials will have to accelerate their search for alterative sources of the mineral.翻译:出口管制可能意味着汽车制造商和电池材料供应商将不得不加快寻找替代矿物来源。

Syrah said that, based on feedback from its customers and analysts, buyers are looking to stockpile graphite to reduce the risk of near-term supply disruptions ahead of the ban, and ahead of China's winter when it tends to produce less natural graphite.翻译:Syrah表示，根据客户和分析师的反馈，买家希望在禁令实施之前以及中国冬季天然石墨产量趋于减少的冬季之前储存石墨，以降低近期供应中断的风险。

"Any disruption or reduction in China anode precursor or AAM export supply without replacement supply would impact battery production outside China," it said.翻译:“中国阳极前驱体或 AAM 出口供应的任何中断或减少而没有替代供应，都将影响中国以外的电池生产，”它表示。

Uncertainties regarding the impact of the controls on Chinese supply is expected to continue into 2024, Syrah added, but for now, it does not expect any near-term "meaningful" impact demand from China on its Mozambique project.翻译:Syrah补充说，中国供应管制影响的不确定性预计将持续到2024年，但目前预计中国近期不会对其莫桑比克项目的需求产生任何“有意义”的影响。

"Although the impacts of implementation are not yet known, the announced graphite export controls in China are increasing Government and private sector attention on the strategic importance of Syrah as a unique ex-China natural graphite and AAM supplier in the battery supply chain," the company said in a statement.翻译:“虽然实施的影响尚不清楚，但中国宣布的石墨出口管制正在增加政府和私营部门对 Syrah 作为电池供应链中独特的前中国天然石墨和 AAM 供应商的战略重要性的关注，”公司在一份声明中表示。

Syrah's comments come as Australian government officials visit the United States to shore up cooperation over critical minerals.翻译:西拉发表此番言论之际，澳大利亚政府官员正在访问美国，以加强关键矿产方面的合作。

Shares in Syrah spiked to 43% to A$0.95 a share on Friday when the export bans were announced before trading at $0.66 cents on Thursday.翻译:周五宣布出口禁令后，西拉股价飙升 43%，至每股 0.95 澳元，周四交易价格为 0.66 美分。

The U.S. International Development Finance Corporation (DFC) last month approved a loan of up to $150 million for Syrah's Mozambique operations.翻译:美国国际开发金融公司（DFC）上个月批准为西拉莫桑比克业务提供高达1.5亿美元的贷款。

Reporting by Roushni Nair in Bengaluru and Melanie Burton in Melbourne, editing by Miral Fahmy翻译:Roushni Nair 在班加罗尔和 Melanie Burton 在墨尔本的报道，Miral Fahmy 编辑

Taiwan's defence ministry said that it had detected 15 Chinese air force planes entering Taiwan's air defence zone on Thursday morning, including fighter jets and drones, accompanying Chinese warships carrying out "combat readiness patrols" and drills.翻译:台湾国防部表示，周四上午发现15架中国空军飞机进入台湾防空区，其中包括战斗机和无人机，伴随中国军舰进行“战备巡逻”和演习。

item.title: 随着美国的打压，中国急于用国内技术替代西方技术
item.description:
Summary:
  • Beijing has increased spending on domestic tech since late 2022翻译:自 2022 年底以来，北京增加了国内科技支出
  • Telecoms and banks likely next to be pushed to use more Chinese products翻译:接下来可能会推动电信和银行使用更多中国产品
  • Replacing Western tech due to geopolitics and cyberattack fears翻译:由于地缘政治和网络攻击的担忧而取代西方技术
  • Foreign firms still dominant in banking-related software翻译:外国公司在银行相关软件领域仍占主导地位

China has stepped up spending to replace Western-made technology with domestic alternatives as Washington tightens curbs on high-tech exports to its rival, according to government tenders, research documents and four people familiar with the matter.翻译:据政府招标、研究文件和四位知情人士透露，随着华盛顿收紧对其竞争对手高科技出口的限制，中国加大了支出，用国内替代品取代西方制造的技术。

Reuters is reporting for the first time details of tenders from the government, military and state-linked entities, which show an acceleration in domestic substitution since last year.翻译:路透社首次报道了来自政府、军方和国家相关实体的招标细节，这表明自去年以来国内替代正在加速。

China has spent heavily on replacing computer equipment, and the telecom and financial sectors are probably the next target, said two people familiar with the industries. State-backed researchers also identified digital payments as particularly vulnerable to possible Western hacking, according to a review of their work, making a push to indigenize such technology likely.翻译:两位熟悉该行业的人士表示，中国在更换计算机设备上投入了大量资金，电信和金融行业可能是下一个目标。根据对他们工作的审查，国家支持的研究人员还发现，数字支付特别容易受到西方黑客的攻击，因此有可能推动此类技术的本土化。

The number of tenders from state-owned enterprises (SOEs), government and military bodies to nationalize equipment doubled to 235 from 119 in the 12 months after September 2022, according to a finance ministry database seen by Reuters.翻译:路透社看到的财政部数据库显示，2022 年 9 月后的 12 个月内，国有企业、政府和军事机构的设备国有化招标数量从 119 起翻了一番，达到 235 起。

In the same period, the value of awarded projects listed on the database totaled 156.9 million yuan, or more than triple the previous year.翻译:同期，入库的获奖项目价值总计1.569亿元，是上年的三倍多。

While the database represents only a fraction of tender bids nationwide, it is the largest collection of state tenders publicly available and mirrors third-party data. China spent 1.4 trillion yuan ($191 billion) replacing foreign hardware and software in 2022, marking a year-on-year increase of 16.2%, according to IT research firm First New Voice.翻译:虽然该数据库仅代表全国招标的一小部分，但它是公开可用的最大的国家招标集合，并反映了第三方数据。 IT 研究公司 First New Voice 的数据显示，2022 年中国在更换外国硬件和软件方面的支出为 1.4 万亿元人民币（1910 亿美元），同比增长 16.2%。

But Beijing's lack of advanced chip-manufacturing capabilities prevents it from completely substituting products with alternatives that are entirely locally made, analysts say.翻译:但分析人士表示，北京缺乏先进的芯片制造能力，使其无法用完全本地制造的替代品完全替代产品。

Previous domestic substitution efforts stalled because China did not have the "technical chops to pull off localization until now, and to a certain extent they still kind of don't," said Kendra Schaefer, head of tech policy research at Beijing-based consultancy Trivium China.翻译:北京咨询公司 Trivium 技术政策研究主管肯德拉·谢弗 (Kendra Schaefer) 表示，之前的国内替代努力陷入停滞，因为中国“直到现在还不具备实现本地化的技术能力，而且在某种程度上仍然不具备”。中国。

FEAR OF DEPENDENCE

SOEs were instructed last year to replace office software systems with domestic products by 2027, the first time such specific deadlines were imposed, according to five brokerage firms that cited a September 2022 order from China's state asset regulator. Reuters could not independently verify the order.翻译:五家券商援引中国国有资产监管机构 2022 年 9 月的命令称，去年，国有企业被要求在 2027 年之前用国产产品更换办公软件系统，这是首次规定这样的具体期限。路透社无法独立核实该订单。

Domestic replacement projects this year have targeted markedly sensitive infrastructure, the tenders show.翻译:招标显示，今年的国内更换项目主要针对敏感的基础设施。

One partially redacted tender for a "certain government department in Gansu province" assigned 4.4 million yuan to replace an intelligence-gathering system's equipment, without providing specifics.翻译:一份经过部分修改的招标书为“甘肃省某政府部门”拨款 440 万元人民币，用于更换情报收集系统的设备，但没有提供具体细节。

People's Liberation Army units in the northeastern city of Harbin and Xiamen in the south last December meanwhile issued tenders to replace foreign-made computers.翻译:去年12月，位于东北城市哈尔滨和南部城市厦门的中国人民解放军部队同时发布了更换外国制造计算机的招标。

Tech researchers such as Mo Jianlei of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, the country's largest state-run research organization, said the Chinese government was increasingly concerned about Western equipment being hacked by foreign powers.翻译:中国最大的国有研究机构中国科学院的莫建雷等科技研究人员表示，中国政府越来越担心西方设备遭到外国势力的黑客攻击。

The state asset regulator did not return a request for comment.翻译:国有资产监管机构没有回复置评请求。

Over the past year, state-linked researchers also called on Beijing to strengthen anti-hacking defences in its financial infrastructure due to geopolitical concerns.翻译:过去一年，出于地缘政治担忧，与国家相关的研究人员还呼吁北京加强金融基础设施的反黑客防御。

One March research paper highlighted the dependence of China's UnionPay credit card system on U.S software firm BMC for settlements.翻译:3 月份的一篇研究论文强调了中国银联信用卡系统对美国软件公司 BMC 结算的依赖。

"Beware of security vulnerabilities in hardware and software set by the U.S. side ... build a financial security 'firewall'," the researchers wrote.翻译:研究人员写道：“谨防美方设置的硬件和软件安全漏洞……建立金融安全‘防火墙’。”

BMC declined to comment.翻译:BMC 拒绝置评。

An article published this year in the journal Cyberspace Security by researchers from the state-run China Telecommunications Corporation concluded the country was overdependent on chips made by U.S. giant Qualcomm (QCOM.O) for back-end management, as well as on the iOS and Android systems.翻译:国营中国电信集团公司的研究人员今年在《网络空间安全》杂志上发表的一篇文章得出的结论是，中国过度依赖美国巨头高通(QCOM.O)生产的后端管理芯片以及 iOS 和安卓系统。

"(They) are all firmly controlled by American companies," the researchers wrote.翻译:“（它们）都被美国公司牢牢控制，”研究人员写道。

As China has not signed World Trade Organization clauses governing public procurement, the substitution effort does not appear to violate international accords, according to the U.S. Treasury. The U.S. has implemented similar rules barring Chinese companies from public sector bids.翻译:美国财政部称，由于中国尚未签署世界贸易组织有关公共采购的条款，因此替代努力似乎并未违反国际协议。美国也实施了类似的规则，禁止中国公司参与公共部门投标。

Qualcomm, Google (GOOGL.O) and Apple (AAPL.O) did not immediately return requests for comment.翻译:高通、谷歌(GOOGL.O)和苹果(AAPL.O)没有立即回复置评请求。

WINNERS AND LOSERS

China's effort to build an independent computing system dates back to at least its 2006 five-year plan for science and technology development, which listed the semiconductor and software systems sectors as national priorities.翻译:中国建立独立计算系统的努力至少可以追溯到2006年的科技发展五年计划，该计划将半导体和软件系统行业列为国家优先发展领域。

This effort spawned state-owned companies that are increasingly winning major contracts. Two firms awarded the Harbin tenders were subsidiaries of China Electronics Corporation and China Electronics Technology Group Corporation - both heavily targeted by U.S. sanctions.翻译:这种努力催生了越来越多的国有企业赢得重大合同。哈尔滨招标的两家公司是中国电子信息产业集团公司和中国电子科技集团公司的子公司，这两家公司都是美国制裁的重点目标。

The state regulator's 2022 order pushed SOEs away from U.S. companies such as Microsoft (MSFT.O) and Adobe (ADBE.O), according to an employee of a Beijing-based firm that develops domestic office-processing software翻译:北京一家开发国内办公处理软件的公司的一名员工表示，国家监管机构的 2022 年命令迫使国有企业远离微软(MSFT.O)和 Adob​​e (ADBE.O)等美国公司

China Tobacco, for example, in July began switching some subsidiaries from Microsoft Windows to Huawei's EulerOS, according to an employee of a software vendor that services the state-owned manufacturer.翻译:例如，据为该国有制造商提供服务的软件供应商的一名员工透露，中国烟草于 7 月开始将部分子公司从微软 Windows 切换到华为的 EulerOS。

The people spoke on condition of anonymity because they were not authorized to discuss clients and competitors.翻译:这些人士要求匿名，因为他们无权讨论客户和竞争对手。

For years, Western tech companies have shared their source code and entered into partnerships with domestic firms to address Beijing's concerns, but prominent computer scientists such as Ni Guangnan of the Chinese Academy of Engineering have said such measures are not sufficient for China's security needs.翻译:多年来，西方科技公司一直共享源代码并与国内公司建立合作伙伴关系，以解决北京方面的担忧，但中国工程院院士倪光南等著名计算机科学家表示，此类措施不足以满足中国的安全需求。

China Tobacco, Microsoft and Adobe did not respond to requests for comment.翻译:中国烟草、微软和Adobe没有回应置评请求。

In September, Reuters and other outlets reported that some employees of central government agencies were banned from using iPhones at work.翻译:9 月，路透社和其他媒体报道称，中央政府机构的一些员工被禁止在工作中使用 iPhone。

"In certain sectors, customers ... are opting for domestic suppliers, with foreign suppliers frequently facing informal barriers," the European Union Chamber of Commerce in Beijing said in response to Reuters questions.翻译:“在某些领域，客户……正在选择国内供应商，而外国供应商经常面临非正式障碍，”北京欧盟商会在回答路透社的问题时表示。

In a 2023 American Chamber of Commerce (AmCham) in Shanghai report, 89% of the organization's tech business members named procurement practices favoring domestic competitors as a regulatory obstacle. It was the highest percentage of any sector.翻译:在上海美国商会 (AmCham) 2023 年的一份报告中，该组织 89% 的科技企业成员将有利于国内竞争对手的采购做法视为监管障碍。这是所有行业中比例最高的。

AmCham Shanghai President Eric Zheng acknowledged China's national security concerns but said he hoped "normal procurement procedures will not be politicized so that US companies can compete fairly and pursue commercial opportunities ... to benefit both countries."翻译:上海美国商会会长郑重承认中国的国家安全担忧，但表示希望“正常采购程序不会被政治化，以便美国公司能够公平竞争并寻求商业机会……让两国受益。”

The U.S. Department of Commerce, China Electronics Corporation and China Electronics Technology Group Corporation did not return requests for comment.翻译:美国商务部、中国电子信息产业集团公司和中国电子科技集团公司没有回复置评请求。

HUAWEI PRIZED

Chinese tech conglomerate Huawei has emerged as the leading firm in this replacement cycle, according to three people familiar with China's enterprise tech industry, who spoke on condition of anonymity given the sensitivity of the issue.翻译:据三位熟悉中国企业科技行业的人士透露，中国科技集团华为已成为这一更换周期中的领头羊。考虑到问题的敏感性，这些人士要求匿名。

In 2022, Huawei's enterprise business, which includes software and cloud computing operations, reported 133 billion yuan in sales, up 30% on the previous year.翻译:2022年，包括软件和云计算业务在内的华为企业业务销售额达1330亿元人民币，较上年增长30%。

One of the people said privately-held Huawei was seen as more nimble than state-owned groups in rolling out products and executing projects.翻译:其中一位人士表示，私营企业华为在推出产品和执行项目方面被认为比国有企业更加灵活。

The other two sources highlighted Huawei's broad product suite - spanning chips to software - as an advantage.翻译:另外两位消息人士强调了华为广泛的产品系列（从芯片到软件）的优势。

Clients also prize Huawei for its ability to process data on internal company servers and external cloud networks, as well as its wide offering of cybersecurity products, according to the employee of a China Tobacco tech supplier.翻译:据中烟一家技术供应商的员工称，客户还因其处理公司内部服务器和外部云网络数据的能力以及提供广泛的网络安全产品而对华为表示赞赏。

Huawei declined to comment.翻译:华为拒绝置评。

The replacement drive has re-drawn entire sub-sectors of the software industry. The combined China market share held by five major foreign makers of database management systems – the majority of which are American - dropped from 57.3% in 2018 to 27.3% by the end of 2022, according to industry group IDC.翻译:更换驱动器重新绘制了软件行业的整个子行业。根据行业组织 IDC 的数据，五家主要外国数据库管理系统制造商（其中大部分是美国制造商）在中国的市场份额合计从 2018 年的 57.3% 下降到 2022 年底的 27.3%。

Despite heavy spending on domestic substitution, however, foreign firms are still dominant suppliers for banking and telecoms database management. Non-Chinese companies held 90% of market share for banking database systems at the end of 2022, according to EqualOcean, a tech consultancy.翻译:然而，尽管在国内替代方面投入了大量资金，外国公司仍然是银行和电信数据库管理的主要供应商。根据科技咨询公司 EqualOcean 的数据，截至 2022 年底，非中国公司占据了银行数据库系统 90% 的市场份额。

Financial institutions are generally reluctant to switch database systems despite government pressure, said one of the industry sources, adding that they have higher stability requirements than many other sectors and local players cannot yet match their needs.翻译:一位业内人士表示，尽管有政府压力，金融机构普遍不愿更换数据库系统，并补充说，金融机构对稳定性的要求比许多其他行业更高，而本地企业还无法满足他们的需求。

Even for personal computers, banks that switch from an international brand to China's dominant supplier Lenovo (0992.HK) would still be reliant on critical chip components provided by Western firms, one of the industry sources said.翻译:一位业内消息人士称，即使在个人电脑方面，从国际品牌转向中国主要供应商联想（0992.HK）的银行仍将依赖西方公司提供的关键芯片组件。

($1 = 7.3165 Chinese yuan)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.3165 人民币）

Reporting by Beijing newsroom; Editing by Brenda Goh and Katerina Ang翻译:北京新闻编辑室报道；编辑：Brenda Goh 和 Katerina Ang

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，拜登将于周五与中国最高外交官王毅通话
item.description:
President Joe Biden is expected to speak with Wang Yi when China's top diplomat visits the White House this week, according to two U.S. officials familiar with planning for the visit.翻译:据两名熟悉访问计划的美国官员透露，预计中国最高外交官王毅本周访问白宫时，乔·拜登总统将与王毅进行交谈。

Wang, who is set to meet Biden's national security adviser Jake Sullivan, at the White House on Friday could see Biden in person at that time, according to one of the people.翻译:据一位知情人士透露，王定于周五在白宫会见拜登的国家安全顾问杰克·沙利文，届时可能会亲自见到拜登。

The White House declined to comment.翻译:白宫拒绝发表评论。

It is unclear how substantial their interaction will be, but even an informal greeting would be Biden's senior-most interaction with the Chinese government since he briefly met Chinese President Xi Jinping's No. 2, Premier Li Qiang, on the sidelines of the G20 summit in New Delhi.翻译:目前尚不清楚他们的互动会有多实质性，但即使是一次非正式的问候，也将是拜登自 2017 年 G20 峰会期间短暂会见中国国家主席习近平的第二号总理李强以来与中国政府的最高级互动。新德里。

It comes as U.S. and Chinese officials set the stage for a long-sought, one-on-one meeting between Biden and Xi at November's Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) summit in San Francisco. Xi and Biden last met at a summit in Bali last November.翻译:在此之际，美国和中国官员正在为拜登和习近平在 11 月于旧金山举行的亚太经合组织 (APEC) 峰会上进行期待已久的一对一会晤做准备。习近平和拜登上次会面是在去年11月巴厘岛峰会上。

Wang is also set to meet Secretary of State Antony Blinken during his trip to Washington this Thursday through Saturday. Several top U.S. officials including Blinken met their Chinese counterparts in Beijing this summer.翻译:王毅还将于本周四至周六访问华盛顿期间会见国务卿安东尼·布林肯。今年夏天，包括布林肯在内的几位美国高级官员在北京会见了中国同行。

Wang is the top foreign affairs official in the Chinese Communist Party and also foreign minister since the dismissal of Qin Gang in July.翻译:王毅是中共最高外交官员，也是自7月秦刚被解职以来的外交部长。

Biden said during a press conference on Wednesday he plans to "compete" with China "according to the international rules - economically, politically, and other ways - but I'm not looking for conflict." He also warned Chinese officials against aggression toward the Philippines.翻译:拜登在周三的新闻发布会上表示，他计划“根据国际规则——经济、政治和其他方式——与中国“竞争”，但我并不寻求冲突。”他还警告中国官员不要侵略菲律宾。

For his part, Xi said on Wednesday China is willing to cooperate with the United States as both sides manage their differences and work together to respond to global challenges, according to Chinese state media.翻译:据中国官方媒体报道，习近平周三表示，中国愿意与美国合作，管控分歧，共同应对全球挑战。

Reporting by Trevor Hunnicutt; Editing by Heather Timmons and Lincoln Feast.翻译:特雷弗·亨尼卡特报道；希瑟·蒂蒙斯和林肯·盛宴编辑。

item.title: 白宫寻求资金用于互联网补贴和拆除中国设备
item.description:
The White House is asking Congress for $6 billion for a government broadband internet subsidy program used by 21 million American households that is set to run out of money next year.翻译:白宫正在要求国会拨款 60 亿美元用于政府宽带互联网补贴计划，该计划供 2100 万美国家庭使用，该计划将于明年耗尽资金。

The Biden administration also wants $3.1 billion to further fund removal of equipment made by Chinese telecoms giants Huawei and ZTE (000063.SZ) from U.S. telecom networks.翻译:拜登政府还希望提供31亿美元，进一步资助将中国电信巨头华为和中兴通讯（000063.SZ）制造的设备从美国电信网络中移除。

The Federal Communications Commission (FCC) previously said removing the equipment, which it says poses national security risks, would cost $4.98 billion. Congress has only approved $1.9 billion. In 2019, Congress told the FCC to require U.S. telecoms carriers that receive federal subsidies to purge their networks of Chinese telecoms equipment.翻译:美国联邦通信委员会 (FCC) 此前表示，移除这些设备将花费 49.8 亿美元，并称这些设备构成国家安全风险。国会仅批准了 19 亿美元。 2019年，国会要求联邦通信委员会要求接受联邦补贴的美国电信运营商清除其网络中的中国电信设备。

Congress previously allocated $17 billion to help lower-income families and people impacted by COVID-19 to gain internet access through a $30 per month voucher to use toward paying for internet service.翻译:国会此前拨款 170 亿美元，帮助低收入家庭和受 COVID-19 影响的人们通过每月 30 美元的代金券获得互联网接入，用于支付互联网服务费用。

The White House says the program known as the Affordable Connectivity Program, helps current users save over $500 million per month on their internet bills. The $6 billion in additional government funding would extend the program through December 2024.翻译:白宫表示，该计划被称为“平价连接计划”，可帮助当前用户每月节省超过 5 亿美元的互联网费用。 60 亿美元的额外政府资金将使该计划延长至 2024 年 12 月。

"Congress should act swiftly to fund the Affordable Connectivity Program and prevent more than 21 million households from losing access to affordable, high-speed internet," said White House National Economic Council director Lael Brainard.翻译:白宫国家经济委员会主任莱尔·布雷纳德 (Lael Brainard) 表示：“国会应迅速采取行动，为平价互联计划提供资金，并防止超过 2100 万家庭失去负担得起的高速互联网。”

Internet service providers say there are about 27 million additional U.S. households that are eligible but are not yet enrolled.翻译:互联网服务提供商表示，还有约 2700 万美国家庭符合资格但尚未注册。

Verizon (VZ.N), Comcast (CMCSA.O) and AT&T (T.N) have all called for Congress to extend the program that could run out of money by March.翻译:Verizon (VZ.N) 、康卡斯特(CMCSA.O)和 AT&T (TN)都呼吁国会延长该计划，该计划可能会在 3 月份耗尽资金。

Reporting by David Shepardson; Editing by Cynthia Osterman翻译:大卫·谢泼德森报道；辛西娅·奥斯特曼编辑

item.title: 中国国防部批评五角大楼年度报告
item.description:
China's defence ministry on Wednesday denounced the U.S. Defense Department's annual report on China, saying it distorts the country's security policy and military strategy.翻译:中国国防部周三谴责美国国防部年度对华报告，称其歪曲中国安全政策和军事战略。

Over the next decade, the People's Republic of China will rapidly modernise, diversify, and expand its nuclear forces, the Pentagon said in its report to U.S. Congress, laying out China's national ambitions, including its defence policy and military strategies.翻译:五角大楼在向美国国会提交的报告中表示，未来十年，中华人民共和国将迅速实现核力量现代化、多样化和扩张，阐述了中国的国家雄心，包括国防政策和军事战略。

The Pentagon said China has more than 500 nuclear warheads and will probably have more than 1,000 warheads by 2030. The report said China would use new fast-breeder reactors and reprocessing facilities to produce plutonium for its nuclear weapons, despite publicly saying the technologies are intended for peaceful purposes.翻译:五角大楼表示，中国拥有超过 500 枚核弹头，到 2030 年可能会拥有超过 1,000 枚核弹头。该报告称，中国将使用新的快中子增殖反应堆和后处理设施来生产核武器所需的钚，尽管公开表示这些技术的目的是出于和平目的。

"We express our strong dissatisfaction and resolute opposition to this report," Chinese Defence Ministry spokesperson Wu Qian said in a statement, adding that it "exaggerates and hypes the non-existent 'Chinese military threat'".翻译:中国国防部发言人吴谦在一份声明中表示，“我们对这份报告表示强烈不满和坚决反对”，并补充说，该报告“夸大和炒作了不存在的‘中国军事威胁’”。

Wu said the development of China's armed forces is aimed at containing the threat of war, safeguarding its own security and safeguarding world peace, and is not aimed at any specific country or target.翻译:吴邦国表示，中国军队的发展是为了遏制战争威胁、维护自身安全、维护世界和平，不针对任何特定国家和目标。

China and the United States have recently traded barbs over global and national security concerns, military interactions in the South China Sea and over Taiwan, which China claims as its own territory.翻译:中国和美国最近就全球和国家安全问题、南海军事互动以及中国声称拥有主权的台湾问题互相指责。

The Pentagon said in 2022 that China "amplified diplomatic, political, and military pressure against Taiwan".翻译:五角大楼在2022年表示，中国“加大了对台湾的外交、政治和军事压力”。

"The so-called report on China's military power released by the United States is full of all kinds of wrong content, including the statement on the Taiwan issue," a spokesperson for China's Taiwan Affairs Office said at a media briefing on Wednesday.翻译:中国国台办发言人周三在例行记者会上表示，美国发布的所谓中国军力报告充满了各种错误内容，包括有关台湾问题的表述。

Calling the military-to-military relationship an important part of Sino-U.S. relations, the Defence Ministry's Wu said, "we maintain frank and effective communication with the United States through military diplomacy".翻译:吴仪表示，两军关系是中美关系的重要组成部分，“我们通过军事外交同美国保持着坦诚有效的沟通”。

But he added the difficulties and obstacles facing relations between the two militaries are created by the United States.翻译:但他补充说，两军关系面临的困难和障碍是美国制造的。

"The United States pretends to be confused, while doing things that harm China's security interests, but at the same time shouting that it wants to manage the crisis and strengthen communication," Wu said.翻译:“美国装糊涂，一边做损害中国安全利益的事情，一边喊着要管控危机、加强沟通，”吴说。

The latest exchange between the two countries comes days before China hosts foreign defence officials at the 10th Xiangshan Forum in Beijing from Oct. 29 to 31.翻译:两国之间的最新交流是在中国于 10 月 29 日至 31 日在北京接待外国国防官员出席第十届香山论坛之前几天进行的。

The United States accepted China's invitation after China turned down a meeting a few months ago between the two countries' defence chiefs.翻译:在中国几个月前拒绝两国国防部长会晤后，美国接受了中国的邀请。

Reporting by Bernard Orr; Editing by Gerry Doyle翻译:伯纳德·奥尔报道；格里·多伊尔编辑

item.title: 中国用新舰艇追赶美国和俄罗斯的导弹潜艇能力
item.description:
China has launched its first nuclear-powered guided missile submarines, according to the Pentagon's latest report on China's military - giving it land and sea attack options once the sole province of U.S. and Russian vessels.翻译:根据五角大楼关于中国军事的最新报告，中国已经下水了第一艘核动力导弹潜艇，这让中国拥有了曾经是美国和俄罗斯船只的唯一管辖范围的陆地和海上攻击选择。

The Pentagon report, published Oct. 20, marks the first apparent confirmation that modified submarines seen in Chinese shipyards over the last 18 months are Type 093B guided missile submarines.翻译:五角大楼10月20日发布的报告首次明显证实过去18个月在中国造船厂看到的改装潜艇是093B型导弹潜艇。

Reuters revealed in May 2022 that satellite images from Huludao shipyard in northeast China showed a new or upgraded class of submarine, possibly with vertical tubes for launching cruise missiles.翻译:路透社于 2022 年 5 月透露，中国东北葫芦岛造船厂的卫星图像显示了一种新型或升级型潜艇，可能配有用于发射巡航导弹的垂直管。

The Pentagon report says that in the short term, the Chinese navy "will have the ability to conduct long-range precision strikes against land targets from its submarine and surface combatants using land-attack cruise missiles, notably enhancing (China's) power projection capability".翻译:五角大楼的报告称，短期内，中国海军“将有能力使用对地攻击巡航导弹从潜艇和水面战舰上对陆地目标进行远程精确打击，特别是增强（中国的）力量投送能力” 。

Known as SSGNs, conventionally armed missile submarines were developed by the Soviet Union during the Cold War in part to target U.S. aircraft carriers, while the U.S. Navy developed its own version by converting ballistic missile boats to carry large numbers of land-attack Tomahawk cruise missiles.翻译:常规武装导弹潜艇被称为SSGN，是苏联在冷战期间开发的，部分目的是针对美国航空母舰，而美国海军则通过将弹道导弹艇改装为携带大量对地攻击战斧巡航导弹来开发自己的版本。

Cruise missiles are typically long-range, precision weapons that, unlike ballistic weapons, fly at low altitudes or skim the surface of the sea.翻译:巡航导弹通常是远程精确武器，与弹道武器不同，巡航导弹可以低空飞行或掠过海面。

The submarine USS Florida fired 93 Tomahawks against Libyan air defences in 2011 - the first combat strikes from a U.S. SSGN and an event that regional military attaches say was closely studied by Chinese strategists.翻译:2011年，佛罗里达号潜艇向利比亚防空系统发射了93枚“战斧”导弹——这是美国战略核潜艇的首次战斗打击，地区武官称中国战略家对这一事件进行了密切研究。

Some analysts say the PLA navy will be eager to deploy the vessels as an extra weapon against aircraft carriers as well as a land-attack platform, allowing strikes from a far greater range than its fleets of smaller attack submarines.翻译:一些分析人士表示，解放军海军将渴望部署这些舰艇，作为对抗航空母舰的额外武器以及对地攻击平台，与小型攻击潜艇舰队相比，可以从更远的范围进行攻击。

The report notes that three of the new SSGNs could be operational by next year, as part of a wider expansion of its submarine fleet - both nuclear and diesel powered - which could number 65 vessels in 2025.翻译:报告指出，三艘新的弹道导弹核潜艇可能会在明年投入使用，作为其潜艇舰队（核动力和柴油动力）更广泛扩张的一部分，到 2025 年，潜艇舰队的数量可能达到 65 艘。

The Chinese defence ministry did not respond to questions from Reuters.翻译:中国国防部没有回应路透社的提问。

The confirmation comes amid an intensifying submarine arms race as China constructs a new generation of nuclear-armed boats as part of its evolving deterrent force.翻译:这一确认是在潜艇军备竞赛加剧之际做出的，中国正在建造新一代核潜艇，作为其不断发展的威慑力量的一部分。

The effort to track China's submarines at sea is one of the core drivers of increased deployments and contingency planning by the U.S. Navy and other militaries across the Indo-Pacific region.翻译:在海上追踪中国潜艇的努力是美国海军和印太地区其他军队增加部署和应急计划的核心驱动力之一。

Singapore-based security scholar Collin Koh said the SSGNs were an important new capability for the Chinese navy.翻译:新加坡安全学者科林·科(Collin Koh)表示，弹道导弹核潜艇是中国海军的一项重要新能力。

With an expected core armament of cruise missiles, "this potentially allows them to carry out saturated land and anti-ship attacks at standoff range”, he said, which would complicate strategic calculations by China's rivals.翻译:他表示，凭借预期的巡航导弹核心武器，“这可能使他们能够在防区外范围内进行饱和陆地和反舰攻击”，这将使中国竞争对手的战略计算变得复杂。

"I would also expect the Chinese have learned from the Russian experience in using them to threaten U.S. aircraft carriers – with an SSGN, you can launch strikes at standoff range, unlike a typical attack submarine that could have more limited weapon options, and that is a real advantage," said Koh, of the S. Rajaratnam School of International Studies.翻译:“我还希望中国人从俄罗斯使用它们威胁美国航空母舰的经验中吸取教训——使用弹道导弹核潜艇，你可以在防区外范围内发动攻击，这与典型的攻击潜艇不同，后者的武器选择可能更加有限，而且这是一个真正的优势，”拉惹勒南国际研究学院的 Koh 说。

Research discussed at the U.S. Naval War College in May noted that the PLA was close to breakthroughs in making its nuclear-powered submarines far quieter and more difficult for the U.S. and its allies to track.翻译:美国海军战争学院五月份讨论的研究表明，解放军在使其核动力潜艇变得更安静、更难以被美国及其盟国追踪方面即将取得突破。

Some diplomats and analysts said, however, that it was unclear whether those breakthroughs had been incorporated into the recently launched SSGNs. The upgrades are expected in nuclear-powered boats launched before the end of the decade.翻译:然而，一些外交官和分析人士表示，目前尚不清楚这些突破是否已被纳入最近发射的弹道导弹核潜艇中。预计本世纪末之前推出的核动力船将进行升级。

"Unless they are certain of improvements, we can expect the PLA navy to be cautious in how they initially deploy them," said an Asian military attache who is tracking China's submarine force. The attache declined to be named because of the sensitivity of the matter. "But we know the submarine force is a priority for Xi Jinping, and this is one more sign they are getting there."翻译:一位正在跟踪中国潜艇部队的亚洲武官表示：“除非他们确定能取得改进，否则我们可以预期解放军海军在最初部署这些潜艇的方式上会持谨慎态度。”由于此事敏感，该专员拒绝透露姓名。 “但我们知道潜艇部队是习近平的首要任务，这是他们正在实现这一目标的又一个迹象。”

Reporting By Greg Torode. Editing by Gerry Doyle翻译:格雷格·托罗德报道。格里·多伊尔编辑
